full_threads.body:
Hello, this is the mail server on mail4.helpscout.net.

I am sending you this message to inform you on the delivery status of a
message you previously sent. Immediately below you will find a list of
the affected recipients; also attached is a Delivery Status Notification
(DSN) report in standard format, as well as the headers of the original
message.

<wordpress@duc-pen.com.au> delivery failed; will not continue trying

Received-From-MTA: dns;pconsumer-0e8c4388c68babc08 (10.0.201.77)

Final-Recipient: rfc822;wordpress@duc-pen.com.au
Action: failed
Status: 5.1.1 (bad destination mailbox address)

Diagnostic-Code: smtp;550 5.1.1 The email account that you tried to reach does not exist. Please try double-checking the recipient's email address for typos or unnecessary spaces. Learn more at https://support.google.com/mail/?p=NoSuchUser n8si14305qtc.227 - gsmtp
X-PowerMTA-BounceCategory: bad-mailbox
